Navigation.title: Open Source Gen24 AI Tool Overview

Footer.title: Open Source Gen24 AI Tool Overview
Footer.subTitle: Explore the Top AI Tools of 2024 - All at Gen24 AI Tool Overview!

1.question: What is Gen24 AI Tool Overview?
1.answer: Gen24 AI Tool Overview - We are building a comprehensive AI tool library to help you discover and use your favorite AI tools. Here, you can find AI tools that cover writing, marketing, content rewriting, SEO optimization, learning assistance, generative design, research, artistic creation, music, video processing, programming, and image processing.

2.question: How can I find the AI tools I need on Gen24 AI Tool Overview?
2.answer-2: 2. Browse the list of AI tools
2.answer-3: 3. Click on the AI tool that interests you to learn more and access it

3.question: What are the special features of Gen24 AI Tool Overview?
3.answer-1: 1. Comprehensive AI tool list: Explore your favorite AI tools for free
3.answer-2: 2. Startup exhibition area: A free exhibition platform for AI tool developers

4.question: Is there a fee to submit AI tools to Gen24 AI Tool Overview?
4.answer: Completely free. However, we recommend sharing the Gen24 AI Tool Overview link on your website to increase exposure!

5.question: What types of AI tools are supported by Gen24 AI Tool Overview?
5.answer: We will soon support all types of AI tools. Please stay tuned for more details.

6.question: How frequently is Gen24 AI Tool Overview updated?
6.answer: Our AI tool list is updated daily.

7.question: Does it support tools like GPT-4o or Sora AI?
7.answer: You can find tools like GPT-4o or Sora AI here and directly access their official websites through our descriptions.

8.question: What should I do if I encounter a malfunction?
8.answer: If the content does not display correctly, try switching browsers or clearing the cache. If the problem persists, please contact us at contact@6677.ai.

9.question: How is the content of Gen24 AI Tool Overview generated?
9.answer: The AI tool descriptions on the platform are automatically generated by OpenAI's GPT-4o.

10.question: About the usage rights of AI tools?
10.answer: Gen24 AI Tool Overview only provides a directory service for AI tools. The specific usage rights are governed by the official websites of each AI tool.

privacyPolicy.1-h1: Gen24 AI Tool Index Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.1-p: This page aims to clearly inform our users about the specific policies on the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information. By choosing to use the Gen24 AI Tool Index, you agree to handle your information in accordance with this privacy policy. We are committed to ensuring that the personal information collected is solely used to enhance the service experience. Unless otherwise stated, your information will be kept confidential.
privacyPolicy.2-p: To continuously improve service quality, we may need you to provide certain personally identifiable information. The requested information will be stored only on your device and will not be collected directly by us. Third-party services involved in our service may collect information used to identify you.
privacyPolicy.3-p: Please note that whenever you use our service, in case of an error in the program, we may collect information from your device through third-party products, including but not limited to your device's IP address, model, operating system version, and the specific time you use our service.
privacyPolicy.4-p: Cookies are a common website feature used to store user preferences. Our service does not directly use cookies but may collect information through third-party components. Users can accept or refuse cookies according to their preference, but please note that refusing cookies may affect some functionality of the service.
privacyPolicy.5-p-1: To ensure the smooth operation of our service, we may entrust third-party companies or individuals to complete the following tasks:
privacyPolicy.5-p-2: These third parties may have access to your personal information to perform their tasks. They are required to use it only to perform the tasks assigned to them and to keep it confidential.
privacyPolicy.6-p: We understand the importance of personal information security and are committed to taking all reasonable measures to protect your information. However, we remind you that no method of transmission over the Internet is completely secure.
privacyPolicy.7-p: Our service may contain links to third-party websites. Clicking on these links will direct you to external sites whose privacy policies are independent of ours. We advise users to review their privacy policies.
privacyPolicy.8-p: We reserve the right to update the privacy policy as needed. Updates will be posted on this page, and we will try to notify you when they become effective. Regularly reviewing this page to stay informed about the latest policy is a good habit.

termsConditions.1-h1: Gen24 AI Tool Index Terms of Use
termsConditions.1-p: Thank you for visiting the Gen24 AI Tool Index! Our platform (located at https://gen24.com) aims to provide a comprehensive directory of AI tools. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to comply with these terms of service. If you do not agree, please do not use this website.
termsConditions.2-p: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, and non-transferable license to access and use our website and its services for personal and non-commercial purposes. Without our written consent, you are not allowed to copy, modify, or use the website content for commercial purposes.
termsConditions.3-p: The ownership of images created on this site belongs to the creator. Gen24.com does not claim any ownership of user-generated content.
termsConditions.4-p: We collect personal data (including names, email addresses, and payment information) and non-personal data (such as website cookies) to optimize the service experience. All data usage is governed by this privacy policy.
termsConditions.5-p: These terms will be governed and interpreted by the laws of the United States, without regard to conflict of law principles.
termsConditions.6-p: We reserve the right to modify or replace these terms at any time, and we will notify you of any major changes via email. Continuing to use the platform implies that you accept these changes.
termsConditions.7-p: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at contact@Gen24.ai.
termsConditions.last-p: Using the Gen24 AI Tool Index indicates your acceptance of all the above terms.
